title: Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant layered rice dish cooked with marinated chicken and aromatic spices.
instructions: Rinse the basmati rice until the water runs clear, then soak it for 20 minutes.
Mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, cumin, biryani masala, and salt. Add chicken and marinate for at least 1 hour.
Boil the soaked rice until it is 70% cooked, then drain completely.
Heat oil in a large pot and layer half of the partially cooked rice at the bottom.
Spread the marinated chicken evenly over the rice layer, then cover with the remaining rice.
Sprinkle saffron milk and fried onions on top for aroma and color.
Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 30 minutes until the chicken is fully cooked and the rice is fluffy.
